title: my Bookmark is not syncing after logging gmail ID on New win-10 machine
content:
Dear Firefox team.

My Laptop OS was dead, I unable to syncing my bookmark on new windows-10 OS and logging with gmail account.

how can i get the syncing bookmark on my laptop.

can anyone help me. my bookmark is very important and up to date till last week.

Version : 24.0.2 (64-bit https://prnt.sc/jY-u_50dt2b7
creator: Sherazs.ali

title: Viewport in the devtools  going out of bounds when resizing the viewport
content: Hello everyone, I’m a fan of Firefox due to its efficient handling of webpage caching and memory management. However, I often find myself switching back to the Chromium-based Edge browser due to one specific feature in its DevTools. In Edge, when I resize the viewport, it stops at a certain limit. If I want to resize it further, I can zoom out and then continue resizing. I find this feature very useful. Is there a way to have similar functionality in Firefox? I’m currently using the Firefox Developer Edition.
creator: kiradaditya2001+firefox

title: Jak nastavit aby při stahování souborů se stejným jménem Firefox automaticky soubory přejmenovával?
content:
Dobrý den,

1) jsem na webové stránce, kde se všechny obrázky jmenují stejně - např. Picture.jpg 2) postupně tyto soubory stahuju do stejného PC adresáře, ale logicky každý musím manuálně přejmenovat, aby se nepřepsaly ty již dříve stažené - a to je poněkud frustrující 3) jiné prohlížeče - Crome, Opera, Bing... - stahované soubory se stejnými jmény při ukládání automaticky přejmenovávají - např. na Picture(1), Picture(2), Picture(3)... 4) je nějaká možnost jak to samé nastavit ve Firefoxu?

předem moc díky za Váš čas

Radim
creator: radim3

title: Washington Post articles are only partially displaying (fully displaying in EDGE)
content:
On: HP OMEN Laptop Processor 12th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-12500H 2.50 GHz Installed RAM 16.0 GB (15.7 GB usable) System type 64-bit operating system, x64-based processor Edition Windows 11 Home Version 23H2 OS build 22631.3447 124.0.2 Firefox Release, April 2, 2024

Since the 2 APR 2024 FF update, Washington Post articles are not displaying fully. When opened, the article flashes the full version, then only displays the top photo and the first two paragraphs. When opened in EDGE, all articles open fully as expected. This issue is only occurring in FF.

Actions taken: Cleared cache, same result.

Please advise.
creator: bbcgrrrl
